text: (Ari rwo) ntumwa ibasomera amagambo ya Allah (Quran) asobanutse, kugira ngo akure mu mwijima babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza anabaganisha ku rumuri. Bityo, uwemera Allah akanakora ibikorwa byiza, (Allah) azamwinjiza mu busitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru) bazabamo ubuziraherezo. Rwose Allah yamutunganyirije amafunguro (meza)
